name: Vegard Gjertsen Gonsholt
bio: I'm a third year computer science student with a strong passion for learning new technologies and contributing to collaborative projects. I enjoy good company, engaging discussions and cooking. I also wouldn't say no to a squash game or a hike in the mountains.

experiences: Provide academic support to computer science students at UiB through the oracle arrangement.
Focus on making topics understandable and strengthening student learning.
Contribute to an accessible and welcoming learning environment.
Represented echo in the finals against other student unions.
Solved programming problems under time pressure.
Completed compulsory military service with high standards of discipline and teamwork.
Customer service and teamwork in a fast-paced environment

codingProjects.title: Wordle AI
codingProjects.description: An AI that plays the popular word game Wordle. It uses a strategy based on letter frequency and position to make educated guesses and improve its chances of winning.

codingProjects.title: Portfolio Website
codingProjects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills. Built with modern web technologies to ensure a responsive and user-friendly experience.

codingProjects.title: Minesweeper
codingProjects.description: A classic Minesweeper game implemented in Java. Features a graphical user interface and allows players to customize the grid size and number of mines.

codingProjects.title: Big Head Kickerz
codingProjects.description: A two-player football game where players control characters with oversized heads and boots. The game features simple controls, fun physics, and even power-ups!

other.description: Support the leader in organizational decisions. Plan and coordinate sports events and social activities.
Plan, market, and organize company presentations and workshops. Advise companies on how to effectively reach out to computer science students.
